20101228020340.000|20101228020342.000|CC1|ONGOING BATTLE WITH A BLIZZARD. 
20101228020342.000|20101228020344.000|CC1|AIRPORTS BEGAN REOPENING AFTER  
20101228020344.000|20101228020346.000|CC1|THE BIG STORM THAT BLEW UP THE  
20101228020346.000|20101228020347.000|CC1|EAST COAST ON SUNDAY, BUT THE   
20101228020347.000|20101228020352.000|CC1|DAMAGE WAS DONE.

20101228020353.000|20101228020354.000|CC1|ACROSS THE NORTHEAST, THE       
20101228020354.000|20101228020356.000|CC1|SCENE WAS THE SAME.             
20101228020356.000|20101228020357.000|CC1|STRANDED PEOPLE WHOSE PLANES    
20101228020357.000|20101228020359.000|CC1|WERE SNOW-BOUND.

20101228020534.000|20101228020535.000|CC1|BETTER BLEW THE SNOW INTO

20101228020540.000|20101228020541.000|CC1|BLOOMBERG SAID THE RECOVERY

20101228020606.000|20101228020607.000|CC1|THE MINNESOTA VIKINGS TO

20101228020652.000|20101228020653.000|CC1|>> Sreenivasan: U.S. DRONE      
20101228020653.000|20101228020654.000|CC1|AIRCRAFT FLYING OVER PAKISTAN   
20101228020654.000|20101228020655.000|CC1|REPORTEDLY KILLED 18 SUSPECTED  
20101228020655.000|20101228020656.000|CC1|MILITANTS IN MISSILE ATTACKS    
20101228020656.000|20101228020658.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20101228020658.000|20101228020659.000|CC1|PAKISTANI INTELLIGENCE OFFICIALS
20101228020659.000|20101228020701.000|CC1|SAID THE STRIKES WERE IN THE    
20101228020701.000|20101228020702.000|CC1|NORTH WAZIRISTAN REGION, NEAR   
20101228020702.000|20101228020703.000|CC1|THE BORDER WITH AFGHANISTAN.    
20101228020703.000|20101228020705.000|CC1|AND OVER THE WEEKEND, THE FIRST 
20101228020705.000|20101228020706.000|CC1|SUICIDE BOMBING BY A WOMAN IN   
20101228020706.000|20101228020707.000|CC1|PAKISTAN HIT A U.N. FOOD        
20101228020707.000|20101228020709.000|CC1|DISTRIBUTION SITE.              
20101228020709.000|20101228020711.000|CC1|IN RESPONSE, THE WORLD FOOD     
20101228020711.000|20101228020712.000|CC1|PROGRAM SUSPENDED OPERATIONS

20101228025116.000|20101228025118.000|CC1|THIS YEAR AND DEMONSTRATED      
20101228025118.000|20101228025120.000|CC1|GREATER THAN 80% OF THE         
20101228025120.000|20101228025123.000|CC1|ON-LINE AD SPEND WOULD BE       
20101228025123.000|20101228025124.000|CC1|EFFECTIVE-- EFFECTED UNDER      
20101228025124.000|20101228025126.000|CC1|THE FTC'S DEFINITION.
